body.name: Wireless Gaming Headset, 2.4GHz USB Gaming Headphones for PC, PS4, PS5, Mac with Bluetooth 5.2, 40H Battery Life, Detachable Microphone, 3.5mm Wired Jack for Xbox Series (Black Red)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 47 mins
features: 【2.4GHz Wireless Connection & 5.2 Bluetooth Chip】KAPEYDESI wireless gaming headset adopts cutting-edge 2.4GHz connection technology (delay ≤ 20ms), which has better freedom and more stable data transmission than traditional wired gaming headsets. Connecting in 2.4GHz mode does not affect the seamless transition to Bluetooth mode when you go outdoors to team up with friends.

【Mesh Earmuffs & 40% Increased Air Permeability】Experience ultimate comfort with the wireless gaming headphones, crafted with professional-grade breathable mesh fabric for extended play. The ps5 wireless headset offers wider head beam protection to ease the pressure. Its adaptive ear shell design suits all, while the ultra-light build feels feather-like.

【FAST CHARGING & LONG BATTERY BATTERY】KAPEYDESI Have more longer gaming sessions with the PS5 headset wireless boasting 40+ hours of battery life. LED mode allows up to 25 hours of use, with the option to disable lights anytime. Get voice prompts when power falls below 3%. Charging the Bluetooth gaming headset fully takes only 2.5 hours.

【3 Mode Connection & Multi-Device Support】①Enjoy seamless connectivity with the PS5 wireless headsets with microphone via a 2.4GHz receiver, linking to PC/PS4/PS5/Switch and more controllers. ②Switch to Bluetooth mode with double-click for mobile devices like phones and tablets (and Switch). ③Use the audio cable to connect to devices with a 3.5mm socket; Xbox series headsets are compatible (need power-off for wired mode).

【Support Use While Charging & Premium Service】The wireless PS5 headset enables uninterrupted gaming or work by allowing usage while charging, even with a low battery. Moreover, the KAPEYDESI 2.4GHz wireless gaming headset for PC offers expert customer support, ensuring responses within 12-24 hours, and providing comprehensive assistance to all users.

Can the Captain 400's wireless functionality be utilized with an Xbox? No, kindly utilize the 3.5MM cable provided in the package when linking to the controller. If the switch features Bluetooth, why is an adapter necessary? The Switch's Bluetooth function does not apply microphone usage, only audio. How can I switch modes? You can toggle between wireless and Bluetooth modes by pressing the power button twice. Can I play while charging? The Captain 400 supports simultaneous charging and playing. However, it's advisable to avoid frequent charging as it may impact battery longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely amazing for the price I love them. Super comfy, I played for 12 hours straight once and they never got even little uncomfortable. Plus they stayed charged the whole time! Sound and mic quality are all great, I keep them at half volume because they can get really loud. Installation for both wire or usb are super easy and well explained and they match the ps5 aesthetic perfect. Great buy definitely worth it 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality of sound and long lasting battery backup.
reviews.reviewText: The Wireless Headset offers an exceptional audio experience, with crystal clear sound. Its comfortable design allows for hours of gaming without any discomfort. The battery life is impressive, ensuring long play sessions without the need to recharge frequently. The microphone clarity is top-notch, ensuring clear call even in the noisy environment and cancel the noise of surrounding. Also, you can remove and attach the microphone. Overall, it's a fantastic choice for any gamer looking for a reliable, high-quality wireless headset came with USB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the most part, this headset is awesome! The USB works no problem, the noise cancelling is really nice, the audio quality is clear, and it's a comfortable headset. My only complaint is that when playing with others and using the microphone, it is really quiet even with turning your voice volume all the way up. You basically have to try and bend the mic to rest against your face for others to actually hear you clearly. It's a pretty good product for the price and I would probably buy it again if I can't afford a better, more expensive headset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent gaming headset!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this headset for my Son for when he plays PS5. He says it’s the best he’s ever had & he’s been gaming for years. He tells me there’s no interference in hearing his friends talk. The connection is easy. These sit on his head comfortably. For the price I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value and features
reviews.reviewText: Purchased based on other reviews and glad I did. Sound was overall good, and the 2.4 Ghz connection was easy and immediate upon setup. These headphones differ from others in several features that I care about.Pros:* They have cloth ear cups vs. the faux pleather. Much easier on the head and reduces the sweat/tacky feeling after wearing them for extended periods of time.* Ear cups are big enough and very comfortable and they are hinged for greater movement and less pressure. Not huge either and lightweight too.* LED light can be toggled on or off. I don't need or care about LED lights and it increases battery charge to just keep it off anyway.* The headphones stay ON, when plugging into the USB-C charge cable. I LOVE this as I don't have to constantly turn them on when I next grab them to use. Most others shut off as soon as you plug them in, and then you spend extra 15 seconds to hold the power button and turn them back on every time you try and use them. I like just picking them up, pulling the cable, and they are ready to go.* Mute button is easy to find and speaks to you audibly if you turn it on or off (as well as a visual aspect described below).Cons:* The volume level is analog dial vs. buttons. I guess I prefer the buttons and visual feedback onscreen.* The microphone itself just looks wonky. It has good range of motion and sounds fine, but it's just that their feature is that the end lights up. So no foam cover on the end, but instead a plastic end which lights up when active and off when on mute. So I guess it's both pro and con, depending on if you like the visual aspect or not, or if you prefer to have a noise canceling foam end on it.Overall - I love these headphones. They fit perfectly, don't make your ears or the area around them sweaty or tacky, and the features are exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable. Very rarely will you see such a cheap product fit well and can be used for long hour sessions of gaming. The audio quality isn't top notch but good enough. Connectivity is good, I saw no drop in audio over a 10 foot distance. Overall I will recommend this to anyone looking to get a cheap PC headset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable AND Great Sound!
reviews.reviewText: These headphones have great sound and long charge. They're a solid choice for the price. Using them for gaming and was pleasantly impressed by the sound quality! Love having a Bluetooth pair so I’m not caught up in cords!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Generally good with some big exceptions
reviews.reviewText: I've had these for a month or two now, for the most part they're good wireless headphones with a significant battery life and good quality sound and mic (though I'm not particularly good at discerning audio quality). The main reason I felt prompted to leave a review though was that almost routinely at this point when I turn it on, at some random point maybe 5-30 minutes afterwards it will randomly turn off and back on, interrupting whatever I was listening to. It doesn't seem to happen again until its turned back off and on, but its consistent enough to be very annoying. Also the plastic on the inner part of the ears presses into the ear a bit, which I find fine for 3-4 hours of use but as someone who works from home and is constantly listening to something or other, it becomes quite uncomfortable for longer durations.
